reviewText: The dancing instructions are not quite as detailed as hoped, but it is a fun video.
Great dance lessons...although, I'm glad I have pause and rewind buttons on my DVD/Blu-Ray player.

If you're looking for improving your technique in Latin Dancing, this DVD will help you some. It goes from Beginner to Advanced in the Merengue, Rumba, Cha Cha, Salsa, and Samba. However, be aware that most if not all dance DVDs by Ms Mason shows only the man's steps. The lady just follows the man's lead. This is not a problem if the man knows his dance steps and is a strong leader. The video is very good and so is the audio.
